entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Agassiz
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Agassiz 10:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Wet snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this evening. Wet snow mixed with rain beginning late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over higher terrain. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Wet snow mixed with rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
